articles.title: Message of Sympathy to British PM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to British PM
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Theresa May, prime minister of Britain, with regard to the terrorist attack in London that caused casualties.
					 He reaffirmed the consistent stand of the DPRK government against all forms of terrorism.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to his British counterpart Boris Johnson on the same day.

articles.title: Egyptian President on Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Egyptian President on Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Ma Tong Hui, DPRK ambassador to Egypt, presented his credentials to Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of Egypt, on March 20.
					 The president hoped that the relations between Egypt and the DPRK with a long tradition of friendship would favorably develop in the future, too.

articles.title: DPPK Will Not Take Part in UN Conference on Nuclear Weapons: Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
DPPK Will Not Take Part in UN Conference on Nuclear Weapons: Foreign Ministry
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday as regards the DPRK's decision not to take part in the United Nations conference to negotiate a legally binding instrument to prohibit nuclear weapons:
					 There will take place the UN conference to negotiate a legally binding instrument to prohibit nuclear weapons at the UN headquarters at the end of March and from mid-June to early in July this year.
					
					 The UN conference reflects the human desire and wish for total elimination of nuclear weapons.
					
					 But question is whether the conference can produce a result reflective of this desire and wish now that the U.S. and other nuclear weapons states deny the participation in the conference.
					
					 As it presents itself as an immediate vital requirement for the DPRK to further bolster the capabilities for self-defence with a nuclear force as pivot given that the U.S. is staging joint military exercises for aggression after introducing largest-ever strategic assets into the Korean peninsula, the DPRK can not but take into serious account its participation in the conference and, therefore, decided not to take part in the conference. 
					
					 But the DPRK will continue to support the idea of the non-aligned movement for the total dismantlement of nuclear weapons and the worldwide efforts for it and will fulfill its responsibility as a nuclear weapons state until the denuclearization of the world is realized.

articles.title: U.S. Deceptive Farce Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Deceptive Farce Denounced
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea on Friday issued a statement titled "U.S. should not run wild, pondering over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its attempt at a preemptive strike".
					 The statement said that the new U.S. administration is floating a rumor that it has excluded the plan for a preemptive attack on the DPRK despite its recent bluffing that it was examining all-inclusive policies toward the DPRK comprising the political, military, diplomatic, economic and all other fields.
					
					 This is a deception to calm down criticism of the public at home and abroad directed toward its extreme hostile policy toward the DPRK and its toughest countermeasure, and a revelation of a criminal design to put the preemptive attack plan into a practice, it noted.
					
					 It urged the new U.S. administration to listen to voice of concern made inside its own country about the serious consequences to be entailed by the preemptive strike and to make a wise option to evade a miserable fate. 
					
					 It also urged the U.S. to immediately stop the racket for war exercises aimed at preemptive strike against the DPRK and take all means for a preemptive attack out of the Korean peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 If the U.S. shows even the slightest sign of a preemptive attack on the DPRK, bereft of reason, the powerful nuclear strike means of the DPRK will blow up the bases of aggression and provocation with its-style offensive and preemptive nuclear attack, the statement said.
					
					 It warned that the U.S. should not run wild, pondering over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its attempt at a preemptive attack.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Should Be Thrown overboard Immediately: Spokesperson for C.C., SWUK
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Should Be Thrown overboard Immediately: Spokesperson for C.C., SWUK
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea (SWUK) released a statement on Friday calling for throwing overboard traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea as early as possible.
					 Park, who was ousted from office by stern judgment of history, is getting ever more brazen-faced and venomous, far from reflecting on her thrice-cursed crimes, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Park's behavior of remaining brazen-faced without an iota of guilty conscience for her hideous crimes against the nation and reunification is just a mockery of the public candlelight actions in south Korea and a blatant challenge to the judgment of history.
					
					 What is more shocking is the fact that Park who has to bitterly repent of her sins is inviting hairdressers every morning.
					
					 It is a disgrace and insult to the Korean women that such an old witch, who is busy with her beauty-making to hide her evil image, is still going scot-free.
					
					 Park, an evil who is shamelessly behaving to dodge her responsibility for the thrice-cursed crimes, has been erased from the list of Korean women forever, the statement declared, saying:
					
					 Traitor Park should be thrown not only out of Chongwadae but of the nation and the human world.

articles.title: Talks between Health Ministers of DPRK and Congo
articles.content:
Talks between Health Ministers of DPRK and Congo
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Talks were held on Friday between Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health of the DPRK, and Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo, minister of Health and Population of Congo who is heading its government delegation.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were officials concerned and from the opposite side members of the Congolese government delegation.
					
					 The talks discussed the matters arising in boosting the relations of friendship between the two countries in public health.

articles.title: DPRK and Congolese Governments Sign Protocol
articles.content:
DPRK and Congolese Governments Sign Protocol
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A protocol on the cooperation in public health between the governments of the DPRK and Congo was signed here on Friday.
					 Present at the signing from the DPRK side were Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk and officials concerned and from the opposition side members of a Congolese government delegation led by Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo, minister of Health and Population.
					
					 Kang and Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo signed the protocol.

articles.title: DPRK Government Gives Reception for Congolese Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK Government Gives Reception for Congolese Delegation
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government hosted a reception on Friday in honor of a delegation of the Congolese government.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the Congolese government delegation led by Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo, minister of Health and Population.
					
					 Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk and officials concerned were on hand.

articles.title: Census to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Census to Be Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will take the census of its population in Juche 107 (2018) in close cooperation with the United Nations Population Fund.
					 To this end, an experimental survey will be made across the country to acquire experience this year and due measures taken for the successful conduct of census in 2018.
					
					 The DPRK had already taken the first and second censuses of its population in 1993 and 2008 respectively.
					
					 A master plan and plans by year were prepared for the successful census and a fiscal plan was announced to put them into practice.
					
					 Meanwhile, a state census committee was formed and began its operation.

articles.title: Sci-tech Achievements Conducive to Great Transformation of Nature Made
articles.content:
Sci-tech Achievements Conducive to Great Transformation of Nature Made
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- In the DPRK, there are many scientists who made devotion to materializing the great plan of the Workers' Party of Korea on transforming the nature. Among them are those of the Global Environment Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University. 
					 In recent years, they have made a big contribution to the prosperity and development of the country with their scientific achievements.
					
					 They made successes in the research into preventing flood damage and taking effective use of water resources in various basins, thus opening up a prospect to increase power production and settle the issues of drinking water, industrial water and irrigation water.
					
					 On the basis of the information on precipitation, water level and opening and closing of floodgates gathered by modern automatic observation apparatus, it was made possible to exactly forecast flood and properly control floodgates.
					
					 They also developed an optimum water-control aid system helpful to ensure safe power production at cascade power stations built along the River Chongchon and made achievements in developing a flood-control aid system.
					
					 And they established a tideland reclamation aid system based on e-map to put the survey of tideland and design and construction of sea dyke on a modern and IT basis.
					
					 They are pushing ahead with researches into making artificial seawater and harnessing ocean current, wave and tide energies.
					
					 Meanwhile, successes have been made in the research into estimating the impact of newly-built hydropower stations on environment and in putting farmland survey and soil analysis on a scientific basis.

articles.title: Tongyang Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Company in DPRK
articles.content:
Tongyang Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Company in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Tongyang Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Company in the DPRK produces Koryo medicines with high efficacy.
					 SponGang solution is in great demand for its diverse effects like antibiosis, sterilization, vasodilatation, detoxification and prevention of cancer.
					
					 Cardiherb, Gastropancreoherb and Hepaherb capsules are known efficacious for circulatory diseases, pancreatitis, gastroenteritis, colitis, enteritis, splenopathy and other diseases.
					
					 The company is also producing functional cosmetics and a tea made with eight staple cereals.
					
					 Jon Yong Ran, manager of the company, told KCNA that Koryo medicines produced by the company help improve the systemic circulation.
					
					 The company ensures the quality control and efficacy of Koryo medicines by means of advanced analyzing and checking instruments and modern technologies, she said, adding:
					
					  It is the working principle of the company to produce high-quality and effective natural Koryo medicines.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S.-led Hostile Forces of Faulting DPRK's Steps for Self-defence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S.-led Hostile Forces of Faulting DPRK's Steps for Self-defence
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army staged a ballistic rocket launching drill  in its territory to smash the ever-increasing nuclear threat and blackmail from the U.S., says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary.
					 Detailing the fact that the U.S.-led hostile forces are taking issue with the above-said rocket launching drill while justifying their illegal nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRK, the commentary notes:
					
					 The army of any country has the mission to defend its sovereignty. Notably, for the DPRK which has long been exposed to nuclear threat and blackmail from the U.S. and sanctions imposed by it, its sovereignty and security and happiness of its people are unthinkable without the People's Army.
					
					 No army in the world conducts a drill with the approval of the United Nations or in accordance with international convention as it is responsible for defending its own country.
					
					 While staging provocative joint war rehearsals with huge aggressor forces involved to seriously threaten global peace and security, the U.S.-led hostile forces are kicking up a row over the steps taken by the DPRK for bolstering up its capability for self-defence, terming them something very serious. This is, indeed, the height of impudence characterized by arrogance and arbitrariness.
					
					 By doing so, they seek to shift the blame for the worst-ever situation on the Korean peninsula onto the DPRK and justify their moves for aggression against it. 
					
					 But this is no more than last-ditch efforts of the warmongers frightened by the tremendous military muscle of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Labels U.S. as World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Labels U.S. as World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. Department of State, in its "Country Report on Human Rights Practices for 2016", took issue with the human rights performance in some countries. It rashly interfered in the internal affairs of various sovereign states over the maltreatment of women and children and the suppression of freedom of civilians. Not content with this, it went the lengths of faulting the frustration of an attempted anti-government military coup in a country.
					 Despite much talk about "human rights" every year, the U.S. is cold- shouldered in various parts of Asia, Africa and Latin America, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article. It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is disqualified to play the role of a human rights judge.
					
					 A handful of the privileged are making a mockery of the political rights of the toiling masses through a game of power. This is the anti-human rights nature of the money-dominated U.S.-style election.
					
					 It is the corrupt U.S.-style freedom and human rights to deprive people of elementary right to existence and all economic, social and cultural rights by shackling them to money.
					
					 It is the U.S. where human trafficking, targeting children and women, etc., is much more rampant than that in other capitalist countries.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S., chieftain of invasion and mass-killing, which caused the worst-ever refugee crisis in the Middle East under the pretext of "anti-terror war."
					
					 The successive U.S. administrations release reports on human rights as national treasure, though they are considered by the international community as waste papers because the U.S. is beset with so many serious human rights issues. Therefore, they invite only derision of all peoples.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to mind its own business before taking issue with others' human rights situation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails Park Geun Hye Group's Publication of White Paper
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails Park Geun Hye Group's Publication of White Paper
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification published a "2017 unification white paper" under the pretext of helping the public "understand all aspects of unification policy." The white paper is peppered with sentences justifying the puppet forces' criminal actions of totally shutting  down the Kaesong Industrial Park and escalating the racket to stifle the DPRK under the pretence of "nuclear and missile threats from the north".
					 Releasing the white paper, a spokesman for the ministry let out rhetoric that "the north should awaken from a delusion of nuclear development" and "something better would be added to the white paper if there be changes in the future".
					
					 Minju Joson Friday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The word "reunification" has not been fit for Park Geun Hye's coteries since their appearance as they have been keen on realizing their wild ambition for "the collapse of the north" while in office in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 As for the puppet Ministry of Unification, it is branded as an anti-reunification and confrontation ministry in south Korea.
					
					 The "Ministry of Unification" exists in name only in south Korea and its real mission is to realize its wild ambition to "bring the north to a collapse."
					
					 The ulterior motive sought by the remnants of Park in publishing the "2017 unification white paper" all of a sudden is to sow the seeds of mistrust, conflict and discord among the fellow countrymen in a bid to prolong their dirty remaining days even a bit by diverting the south Korean people's criticism of them to the north and keep the north and the south from getting reconciled.
					
					 But the desperate efforts made by the confrontation maniacs before their doomsday would get them to nowhere.

articles.title: S. Koreans of Various Circles Protest Conservative Media
articles.content:
S. Koreans of Various Circles Protest Conservative Media
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- South Koreans of  various circles including persons of culture and arts and workers staged a demonstration before the head office of newspaper  Chosun Ilbo on March 20 in protest against its story defiling the anti-Park Geun Hye actions, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 The demonstrators accused Chosun Ilbo of letting out a flurry of invective insulting them, describing the site of sit-in strike inside tents on March 13 as "ugly scenes."
					
					 They declared that they would struggle until the end of the conservative media.
					
					 At the end of the demonstration they held a meeting again.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Halt to THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Halt to THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration launched a campaign involving 10,000 people to stop the THAAD deployment and realize peaceful reunification, according to the south Korean online newspaper Thongil News.
					 A press conference took place at the Kwanghwamun Plaza Wednesday. Speakers there accused the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes of blocking the dialogue and breaking mutual trust between the south and the north.
					
					 Noting the top priority task for eliminating evils is to repeal the "Security Law" strangling the pro-reunification movement organizations, they can never allow the U.S. to deploy THAAD in south Korea as it is being opposed by all the people, they said.
					
					 They called for stopping the deployment of THAAD immediately, nullifying the agreement on sexual slavery for the Japanese army, restoring the relations with the north, paving the way for NGO exchange, concluding a peace treaty, repealing the SL and retaking OPECON.

articles.title: Day of 21st All-People Action Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Day of 21st All-People Action Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The people's emergency action for resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime reportedly held a press conference in Seoul on Thursday and declared its plan for holding the day of the 21st all-people action.
					 Speakers at the conference vowed to demonstrate that the candlelight actions which culminated in the victory of the struggle for impeaching Park are going on for the settlement of pending issues, stressing the 21st all-people action would demand a probe into the truth behind "Sewol" incident and punishment of the mastermind, withdrawal of THAAD deployment, the scrapping of Park Geun Hye regime's other policies and elimination of its evils and punishment of U Pyong U and conglomerates and other accomplices.
					
					 They demanded the detention of Park keen on covering up crimes going against candlelight actions and the resignation of boss of the Park regime Hwang Kyo An.

articles.title: Young Koreans in China Hail DPRK's Test of High-Thrust Engine
articles.content:
Young Koreans in China Hail DPRK's Test of High-Thrust Engine
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nyo, chairperson of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China, issued a statement on March 20 reflecting the excitement of members of the federation at the news that the DPRK succeeded in the ground jet test of Korean-style high-thrust engine under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The statement said that the news made all members of the federation and other Koreans in China feel joy and national pride of being members of the military and space power.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un led the army and people in the sacred struggle for defending the destiny of Kim Il Sung's nation to make successes in the first H-bomb test and the satellite launch, brought about a great victory in the successful ground jet test of new-type high-thrust engine and gave all credit to his soldiers.
					
					 Watching him on TV hugging and taking on his back the soldiers, we shouted hurrahs for the great fortune and gratitude of holding such a great man as the father of the nation.
					
					 All young Koreans in China will bear in mind the victory of today and fully discharge the honorable mission and duty as overseas young vanguard of Kim Jong Un that will leave vivid trace on the way of patriotism like the scientists and technicians in the field of national defense in the homeland.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Nigeria
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, (the Day of the Sun), was formed in Abuja on March 17.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee worked out a plan to introduce the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and the greatness of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and the achievements made by the Korean people in building a socialist power under his guidance and hold such political and cultural events as celebration meeting and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Regional Social Organization of Russia "Borozino" formed a preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, on March 17.
					 Chairman of "Borozino" Salinikov was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set a celebration period from March 17 to April 17 and decided to significantly hold colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary careers and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: Slovenian Body Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Slovenian Body Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association sent a letter to the U.S. embassy in Slovenia on March 15 to protest the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					 The organization can not repress astonishment at the situation of the Korean peninsula inching close to the very dangerous phase, the letter said, adding:
					
					 The military drills staged by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are war games for preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Due to the U.S. moves, a touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The war in the 1950s should not be repeated again on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should withdraw its hostile policy toward the DPRK and take its hands off the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: RPDC no participara en el Congreso de ONU: anuncia el portavoz del MINREX
articles.content:
RPDC no participara en el Congreso de ONU: anuncia el portavoz del MINREX
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea no participara en el Congreso de la ONU para las negociaciones sobre el convenio de prohibicion de armas nucleares, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 24 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					A finales de marzo y desde mediados de junio hasta principios de julio, se abrira el Congreso de la ONU para negociar el convenio de prohibicion de armas nucleares en la sede de esa organizacion internacional.
					
					Este conclave refleja la aspiracion y anhelo de toda la humanidad sobre la cancelacion total de artefactos nucleares.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. y otros poseedores existentes de armas nucleares rehusan la participacion en el Congreso de la ONU, cabe la duda de que esta cita tenga un resultado que refleje la aspiracion y anhelo de toda la humanidad.
					
					Para colmo, EE.UU. esta librando ahora en la Peninsula Coreana los ejercicios militares conjuntos de caracter agresivo movilizando el mayor numero de sus propiedades estrategicas. En tales circunstancias, se presenta a la RPDC la prioridad vital de consolidar aun mas la capacidad de autodefensa nacional centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares. Por esta razon, la RPDC se vio obligada a considerar con seriedad la participacion en el Congreso de la ONU y tomo la decision de no asistir.
					
					Pero, nuestro pais seguira apoyando en el futuro tambien el ideal del MNOAL y los esfuerzos mundiales por la eliminacion total de armas nucleares y cumplira con su responsabilidad del pais poseedor de armas nucleares hasta que se logre la desnuclearizacion del mundo entero.

articles.title: Portavoz de USMC insiste en eliminar a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz de USMC insiste en eliminar a Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- La portavoz del Comite Central de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea publico el dia 24 la declaracion intitulada "Hay que sepultar lo mas pronto posible a la diabla sin igual que actua cinicamente sin arrepentirse de sus horribles crimenes". 
					Se pone cada vez mas cinica y perversa la traidora Park Geun-hye, condenada severamente por la historia y depuesta del poder, adelanta la nota y continua:
					
					El proceder de Park, quien no siente ninguna culpabilidad por sus imperdonables crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion, resulta una burla insoportable a la poblacion levantada en la lucha con velas y desafio frontal a la sentencia de la historia.
					
					Lo mas pasmado del caso es que lejos de derramar lagrimas de arrepentimiento, ella no piensa en otra cosa que el maquillaje llamando cada manana a su casa a las peluqueras.
					
					La existencia de tal mujerzuela, que malemplea el maquillaje para pintar su cara diabolica, es una verguenza de las coreanas e insulto a toda la poblacion femenina. 
					
					Hay que eliminar cuanto antes a la bruja que rehusa pagar sus incontables crimenes de toda indole. 
					
					Ella merece ser expulsada de Chongwadae, la lista de la nacion coreana y del mundo humano.

articles.title: Firmado protocolo entre los gobiernos de la RPDC y la Republica del Congo
articles.content:
Firmado protocolo entre los gobiernos de la RPDC y la Republica del Congo
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el viernes en esta capital el protocolo sobre la cooperacion en el sector de salud publica entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica del Congo.
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes el ministro de Salud Publica Kang Ha Guk y otros funcionarios por la parte coreana y, por la congolena, los integrantes de la delegacion del gobierno de la Republica del Congo, encabezada por la ministra de Salud Publica y Poblacion, Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo.
					
					Kang Ha Guk y Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo firmaron el documento.

articles.title: Tendra lugar censo de poblacion en 2018
articles.content:
Tendra lugar censo de poblacion en 2018
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- El ano proximo, tendra lugar de modo simultaneo en Corea el censo de poblacion en estrecha cooperacion con el Fondo de la Poblacion de la ONU.
					Para la exitosa marcha del evento, se realizara este ano el ensayo en escala nacional y se tomaran las medidas correspondientes.
					
					El primer censo tuvo lugar en el ano 1993 y el segundo en 2008.
					
					Se han trazado el plan general y los anuales para el tercero de 2018 y el de financiamiento.
					
					Como parte de los preparativos, entro en la operacion el recien fundado Comite Nacional del Censo Simultaneo de la Poblacion.
